channel.title: Help Port forwardign and hosting
channel.description: Ok so I learned how to make a server.....but I'm now making a fully customized client. So when I compress it and run it, it is running good till I get to the point where I need to enter IP adress and yeah so I'm like hmmm I wanted to make an OFFLINE server not an online one. It alrewady has the port but not the IP address so I got an Ip adress from no-ip I installed their software and and I then type in the Ip in the box it does not work I enter mine then It does not work...I then remember I had to port forward and so then I checked the port it says it is blocked or not open I go under my firewall I create new port then I retry and still the port is blocked or not reachable. Please help me :(

item.title: Help Port forwardign and hosting
item.dc:creator: @Ownage100x Ownage100x
item.description:
@Ownage100x wrote:

Windows Vista Home Premium let me go check router [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 28, 2009, 08:13:55 am[/size][hr]“D-Link 108GB MMO Wireless” I think that is what is called but I have 2 computers 1 computer is hooked up with the router and motem another one is wireless to connect to the router and that is what I’m using I have a “SRK 400 speed and range expansion” I think I have this to connect to the router[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 28, 2009, 10:09:02 am[/size][hr]i got a video on my probleme here is the link http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BxTTRdxPThA

Read full topic

item.title: Help Port forwardign and hosting
item.dc:creator: @Ownage100x Ownage100x
item.description:
@Ownage100x wrote:

Ok so I learned how to make a server…but I’m now making a fully customized client. So when I compress it and run it, it is running good till I get to the point where I need to enter IP adress and yeah so I’m like hmmm I wanted to make an OFFLINE server not an online one. It alrewady has the port but not the IP address so I got an Ip adress from no-ip I installed their software and and I then type in the Ip in the box it does not work I enter mine then It does not work…I then remember I had to port forward and so then I checked the port it says it is blocked or not open I go under my firewall I create new port then I retry and still the port is blocked or not reachable. Please help me
